name: Iron Man
details: Get ready to swing through the city as Spider-Man! This action figure features realistic web-slinging action with retractable web lines. With multiple points of articulation, you can pose Spidey in various dynamic positions for epic battles against villains like the Green Goblin and Venom.

name: Super Man
details: Transform into a skilled spy like Black Widow with this spy kit. It includes a retractable baton for close-quarters combat, wrist blasters that shoot darts or grappling hooks, and a disguise kit with sunglasses and a wig for blending into any situation. Prepare for covert missions and thrilling espionage adventures.

name: Car Robot
details: Possess the power of a god with the Thor Mjolnir hammer. This toy replica features intricate detailing, including engraved symbols and a weathered finish. Swing the hammer and hear thunderous sound effects while unleashing your imagination as the mighty Thor, defender of Asgard.

name: Robocop
details: Become a symbol of freedom and justice with the Captain America shield frisbee. Made of lightweight yet sturdy material, it resembles Captain America's iconic shield. Practice your throwing skills and watch as the shield frisbee spins through the air, just like in the movies.

name: Hulk Smash
details: Unleash your inner Hulk with these incredible Hulk smash hands. Made of soft yet durable material, these oversized hands fit most sizes. With built-in grip handles, you can make smashing gestures and reenact the Hulk's powerful punches as you let loose your mighty rage.

name: Batman
details: Gear up as the Dark Knight with the Batman utility belt. It includes adjustable straps for a comfortable fit and compartments to store your crime-fighting gadgets. This set also comes with Batarangs, allowing you to practice your throwing skills and take down Gotham's most notorious criminals.

name: G-one
details: Equip yourself with the power of the Amazons using the Wonder Woman battle sword and shield set. The sword features intricate detailing and sound effects, while the shield is adorned with the iconic emblem. Feel empowered as you wield these legendary weapons and fight alongside Wonder Woman in the battle against evil.

name: Iron Man
details: Embrace your inner hero and take flight with the Superman flying cape. Made with high-quality materials, this cape attaches to your shoulders with adjustable straps. Pull the rip cord, and watch as the cape gracefully spreads out, allowing you to feel like the iconic Man of Steel soaring through the skies.

name: Super Fast
details: Suit up as Tony Stark's alter ego, Iron Man! This action figure showcases the Mark XLVII armor, featuring light-up repulsor blasts, removable helmet, and interchangeable hands. With incredible attention to detail, you can recreate Iron Man's heroic moments from the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

name: Super Man
details: Join the futuristic world of law enforcement with this RoboCop transforming robot. This toy seamlessly transforms from a sleek vehicle mode into a powerful humanoid robot. Complete with sound effects and light-up features, it brings the iconic character to life, ready to enforce justice and combat crime.

name: Car Robot
